head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RYAN, PHILIP J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RYAN, PHILIP J.

block.p: RYAN-Philip J. On May 31, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Marion; loving father of Edward and grandfather of Joseph; dear uncle of Regina Finn, Philip, Edward and Monica. Visitation on Saturday and Sunday, 2-5 & 7-9, McLaughlin & Sons, 8225 3rd Avenue. Mass of Christian Burial, on Monday, at 10:00 AM, St. Anselm's RC Church.

RYAN-Philip J. On May 31, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Marion; loving father of Edward and grandfather of Joseph; dear uncle of Regina Finn, Philip, Edward and Monica. Visitation on Saturday and Sunday, 2-5 & 7-9, McLaughlin & Sons, 8225 3rd Avenue. Mass of Christian Burial, on Monday, at 10:00 AM, St. Anselm's RC Church.
